Class ThemedMatteBorder

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder

ca.cgjennings.ui.ThemedMatteBorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Border
public class ThemedMatteBorder extends MatteBorder
A matte border whose default style matches the current Theme.
See Also:
